DOC.brief_summary: The investigator interested use social norm motivate people sign 100-day exercise challenge explore make social norm message effective .
DOC.brief_title: Using Social Norms Encourage People Exercise More
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator interested use social norm motivate people sign 100-day exercise challenge explore make social norm message effective . Specifically , primary purpose study test ( ) whether social norm message ( i.e. , information many people sign challenge ) increase signup rate eventually lead people exercise ( b ) whether message become effective highlight different type motivation ( intrinsic vs. extrinsic motivation ) . Through partnership university , investigator run large-scale , randomized field control trial aim increase sign-ups challenge exercise frequency challenge . Benefits-eligible employee partner university randomly assign one four experimental condition receive correspond version email message encourage sign challenge . ( 1 ) In control group , email mention number people sign . ( 2 ) In norm condition , email mention number people sign . ( 3 ) In norm health motive condition , email mention number people sign , highlight challenge design help people stay fit fun way . ( 4 ) In norm reward motive condition , email mention number people sign , highlight challenge design help people stay active earn reward . The investigator hypothesize Groups 2 , 3 , 4 high sign-up rate high exercise frequency average Group 1 , positive social norm motivate people engage target , desirable behavior . Also , investigator compare sign-up rate exercise frequency Groups 2 , 3 , 4 examine whether highlight intrinsic extrinsic motif increase sign-up rate overall exercise frequency give social norm information . All benefits-eligible employee partner university Human Resource ( HR ) office email address record receive invitation email HR . The invitation email contain intervention send one week AFTER registration period start , HR need know many people sign first week use information create social norm message . Employees sign challenge first week registration period ( i.e. , prior implementation intervention ) affect intervention . Thus , investigator decide advance employee exclude analysis . Employees receive two email send eight day apart . Thus , investigator plan examine sign-up rate within one week email go overall sign-up rate throughout 50-day registration period . The investigator plan explore moderator base ( ) employee ' demographic ( age , gender , ethnicity , position ) , ( b ) employee ' participation previous challenge , ( c ) employee ' health condition fitness level prior challenge ( actively participate wellness activity , health statistic ) .
DOC.criteria: All benefitseligible employee partner university Human Resource office email address record Employees sign challenge prior implementation intervention NOT include analysis . ( The intervention implement one week registration period start . The partner university send invitation email benefitseligible employee email address record , include already sign . However , employee already sign affected intervention thus exclude analysis . )
